task.question: What did the Danites ask of the Levite (Judg 18:19)?

choices.choice: To kill Micah
To help them steal Micah’s idols
To be their father and priest
To pray to the Lord for them

task.answer: To be their father and priest

task.question: How did the Levite respond to the Danite’s request (Judg 18:20)?

choices.choice: He took the ephod and the household gods and left
He killed Micah and left with the Danites
He refused to go until the Danites threatened him with death
He asked the Lord to show him a sign

task.answer: He took the ephod and the household gods and left

task.question: Who overtook the Danites and shouted at them (Judg 18:22)?

choices.choice: The Philistines
The Gileadites
The Levites and priests
The men who lived near Micah

task.answer: The men who lived near Micah

task.question: How did the Danites get Micah to stop chasing after them (Judg 18:25)?

choices.choice: They burned his house down
They burned his fields down
They threatened that some hot head would kill his family
They put Micah in prison and set guard over him

task.answer: They threatened that some hot head would kill his family

task.question: How were the people of Laish described before the Danites attacked them (Judg 18:27)?

choices.choice: A strong and prosperous people
A peaceful and unsuspecting people
A mighty people living in a walled city
A gentle people with flocks and herds

task.question: What did the Danites do at Laish (Judg 18:27)?

choices.choice: Lived among them
Attacked them and burned down their city
Paid them in order to settle there
Worshipped the gods of the people there

task.answer: Attacked them and burned down their city

task.question: Why were the people of Laish so easy to overtake (Judg 18:28)?

choices.choice: They were weak and had no walls or gates
The Lord was fighting for the Danites
They had no alliances with anyone else
They were surprised by the night attack of the Danites

task.answer: They had no alliances with anyone else

task.question: What city was associated with Laish but too far away to help them (Judg 18:28)?

choices.choice: Damascus
Jabesh Gilead
Antioch
Sidon

task.question: What did the Danites do after attacking Laish (Judg 18:28)?

choices.choice: Rebuilt the city and settled there
Buried all the dead and set up a high place there
Moved on into the area of Sidon
Sacrificed to God and set up golden calves there

task.answer: Rebuilt the city and settled there

task.question: What was the city of Dan originally called (Judg 18:29)?

choices.choice: Kiriath Sepher
Laish
Kiriath Arba
Jebus
